title: Kubernetes 1.31 Arrives with New Support for AI/ML, Networking
author: Chris J Preimesberger
description: This release, nicknamed "Eli," introduces Device Resource Assignment, which standardizes the process of accessing hardware accelerators.
cntitle: Kubernetes 1.31 发布，新增对 AI/ML 和网络的支持
cndescription: 此版本代号为“Eli”，引入了设备资源分配，该功能标准化了访问硬件加速器的流程。
